divs: sighting detailsi was on top of a 3 story parking garage in downtown chico ca on 12-31-12 newyears eve. then at midnight after giving hugs to friends i had this feeling to look to the sky and i saw 4-6 mabye more stationary orangish\red lights about 30-33 degrees off of the horizion due west. at first they looked like a bunch of news coppters circling an accident then focusing my eyes more they were not movingand they were not coppters they were what appeared to be 1 orange\red glowing light on each end and between them was a centered yellow light with goldish aura bridging betweenthe end lights and center yellowlight. the thing i cant stop seeing in my mind is that they were in some sort of definative patern or formation. before my eyes focused i was thinkingat first glance itlooked just like a constlation in the night sky and then i turned to let my friends know and when i looked back i could clearly see that each area of lights were stratigicaly placed styarting from the lowest light going upward in the sky, but same general place like spiral staircase progresivly shortening in distance of area between lights then me and my 2 friends all looked at each other (in my head i'm thinking holymy goodness) then looked back and everything vanished and it was over about ahalf hour later thinking about formation in my mind i can just about see the fibinacci sequence super imposed over the picture i was blessed with last night namaste
Summary: saw 4-6 lights statioary just above horizion in apperant formation at midnight on 1-1-13for 45 secs then vanished
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Chico
There were no other sightings in Chico on or around January 1st 2013
